function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unidentified text content","Impact":"Inability to understand or interpret the text","Mitigation":"Use appropriate encoding or language translation technology","Technologies":"Encoding, language translation tools","People":"General users","Owner":"Content creators"},{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases","Impact":"Risk of spreading infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement hygiene measures, social distancing, and vaccination","Technologies":"Hygiene technologies, vaccination technologies","People":"General public","Owner":"Health authorities, government"}]}
